Content:
Prior to today my wife had stuck to backroads, with the exception of a 6 mile stint in traffic.
Prior to two days ago it was not uncommon for her to go 5 MPH under the speed limit on straight roads.
Two days ago we rode to a park on backroads, which was a 28 mile round trip; she finally went the speed limit and I could see her confidence on the motorcycle growing. When we got home she said she wanted to ride the motorcycles to lunch on Friday; surprisingly, she picked a restaurant she likes a little distance from here.

Today was the day, 21 miles (45 minutes in traffic) one way to a restaurant by the water.
The weather was sunny and 70 degrees, perfect.
We had smoked fish dip appetizer and split a fried seafood platter, tasty.
The outing was fun and my wife's motorcycle riding & confidence continues to improve.

Title: My wife's longest motorcycle ride so far. Edit another ride added.
Author: CDW4ME
